Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27478151] Gram-negative bacteria :Porphyromonas gingivalis(IC50=2.5±0.7 μM).[Ref.26850838] Fungi:Candida albicans(IC50=58±22 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27478151] 3% hemolysis at 50 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans
